content.question: Hic, ubi disiectas moles avulsaque saxis saxa vides, mixtoque undantem pulvere fumum, Neptunus muros magnoque emota tridenti fundamenta quatit totamque a sedibus urbem (5) eruit. Hic Iuno Scaeas saevissima portas prima tenet... Aeneid 2.608-613 Translate the passage above as literally as possible.

frqParts.text: Hic, ubi disiectas moles avulsaque saxis saxa vides, mixtoque undantem pulvere fumum, Neptunus muros magnoque emota tridenti fundamenta quatit totamque a sedibus urbem (5) eruit. Hic Iuno Scaeas saevissima portas prima tenet... Aeneid 2.608-613 Translate the passage above as literally as possible.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
